security.title: Security Warning
security.intro: This playground runs JavaScript code directly in your browser.
security.bulletUntrusted: Do not run code from untrusted sources
security.bulletStorage: Code has access to localStorage and cookies
security.bulletUnderstand: Avoid pasting code you do not fully understand
security.bulletSensitive: Do not enter sensitive or personal information
security.note: Use this playground only with code you write or from trusted sources.
